org.javalite.activejdbc.validation

Interface Validator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AttributeLengthValidator, AttributePresenceValidator, Converter, DateConverter, EmailValidator, NumericValidator, RangeValidator, RegexpValidator, TimestampConverter, UniquenessValidator, ValidatorAdapter

    public interface Validator

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String formatMessage(Locale locale, Object... params)
      Formats a message with locale.

        Sets an message on this validator.

      • formatMessage

        String formatMessage(Locale locale,
                   Object... params)
        Formats a message with locale.
        Parameters:

        params - parameters in case a message is parametrized.
        Returns:
        formatted message
